response.skills: Microsoft Power BI, Analyse de données, adaptabilité, collaboration, esprit d'équipe, Autonomie, Supply Chain Management, Visual Basic pour Applications (VBA), french, spanish, english, Microsoft Excel, Travail d’équipe, Gestion de la chaîne logistique, gestion de stocks

profile_positions.description:
A 6 months final internship project in the purchasing office of the group Armand Thiery, locking to improve the inventory management  and store replenishment.
- Creation of a tool that will help the managers to make the right decision in terms of transfers of stock among the stores. 
- Actualisation of the tool to monitoring the locations of the products. Developed in MS Access. Taking into account the needs of the managers and the marketing service. 
- KPI Analyse, inventory levels
- Forecast, creation of live curves of the products
- Stores supply via Scortex and Storeland
profile_positions.title: Supply chain management intern

profile_positions.description:
Quality analyse project of the shipment companies performance for an e-business company.  
-KPI definition and analyse 
-Optimisation of the ordering preparing process 
-Actualisation of AT&B customer's website.
profile_positions.title: Transport project evaluation intern

profile_positions.description:
Reduction time of the ordering preparing in a logistics platform

Study of regrouping and storage methods of a warehouse 
Analyse of abc-method implementation
profile_positions.title: Optimisation intern

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

company.name: Air Liquide
company.description:
A world leader in gases, technologies and services for Industry and Health, Air Liquide is present in 73 countries with approximately 67,100 employees and serves more than 3.9 million customers and patients. Oxygen, nitrogen and hydrogen are essential small molecules for life, matter and energy. They embody Air Liquide’s scientific territory and have been at the core of the company’s activities since its creation in 1902. 

Taking action today while preparing the future is at the heart of Air Liquide’s strategy. With ADVANCE, its strategic plan for 2025, Air Liquide is targeting a global performance, combining financial and extra-financial dimensions. Positioned on new markets, the Group benefits from major assets such as its business model combining resilience and strength, its ability to innovate and its technological expertise. The Group develops solutions contributing to climate and the energy transition—particularly with hydrogen—and takes action to progress in areas of healthcare, digital and high technologies. 

Air Liquide’s revenue amounted to more than 29.9 billion euros in 2022. Air Liquide is listed on the Euronext Paris stock exchange (compartment A) and belongs to the CAC 40, CAC 40 ESG, EURO STOXX 50, FTSE4Good and DJSI Europe indexes.
